arts.ttl: The Aston Villa duo that impressed Unai Emery in win over Leicester City
arts.sum: Aston Villa manager Unai Emery is hopeful Leon Bailey will grow in confidence after he scored his first goal of the season against Leicester City this afternoon. arts.ttl: Leicester City plotting bargain move for 27-year-old Premier League ace
arts.sum: Leicester City are reportedly keen on signing the Southampton defender Kyle Walker-Peters. The 27-year-old defender is in the final few months of his contract at the English club and Leicester are hoping to secure his services for a nominal price this month, as per Sky Sports. arts.ttl: Unai Emery stresses importance of Aston Villa’s win over Leicester
arts.sum: Victory keeps Villa’s top-four challenge on course.
Aston Villa head coach Unai Emery says he is "proud" of his side's 2-1 Premier League victory over a "difficult" Leicester City side.

arts.ttl: John McGinn injury update as Unai Emery confirms fresh Aston Villa blow
arts.sum: Unai Emery fears he could lose John McGinn for a number of weeks, depending on the severity of the hamstring injury he suffered in Aston Villa's win over Leicester City. arts.ttl: Foxes must convert performances into points - Van Nistelrooy
arts.sum: Leicester City manager Ruud van Nistelrooy believes his side "controlled the game" and are showing signs of improvement despite a 2-1 loss at Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Arsenal could be dealt transfer blow by Unai Emery as 'sensational' swap talks planned
arts.sum: Arsenal reportedly suffer a blow in their pursuit of Paris Saint-Germain striker Randal Kolo Muani, whom Aston Villa could swap for Jhon Duran.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa fans are all saying the same thing about Leon Bailey after win over Leicester
arts.sum: Aston Villa have made it seven games unbeaten at home as they ran out 2-1 winners over Leicester City on Saturday. The Villans opened the...

arts.ttl: Bailey strikes late as Aston Villa beat Leicester
arts.sum: Mavididi, who had missed a gilt-edged chance to put Leicester in front soon after half-time, made amends as he fired in the equaliser five minutes later, but the Foxes could not find a second response after Bailey’s goal. Aston Villa returned to winning ways in the Premier League, with Leon Bailey’s late goal earning a 2-1 victory over Leicester City.

arts.ttl: Bailey nets winner as Aston Villa edge Leicester
arts.sum: Leon Bailey scored the winner in Aston Villa's 2-1 Premier League victory over Leicester City, after Stephy Mavididi's equaliser had cancelled out Ross Barkley's strike in an action-packed second half on Saturday.
